description: This file contains utility functions for type checking, data conversion, and data serialization, including handling dataclasses and Pydantic models.

methods.name: isinstanceany
methods.description: Checks if an object is an instance of any class in a list of classes.

methods.name: str_to_int
methods.description: Converts a string to an integer safely, returning None if conversion fails.

methods.name: is_empty
methods.description: Checks if a value is None or empty.

methods.name: get_image_str
methods.description: Constructs a Docker image string from repository and tag.

methods.name: dataclass_to_dict
methods.description: Converts a dataclass object to a dictionary, with options to exclude certain keys and None values.

methods.name: nested_model_dump
methods.description: Recursively serializes Pydantic models, dicts, and lists into serializable structures.
